entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023
